welcome_message_body: Welcome to Chiryu, Japan! This charming city is known for its historical sites, beautiful parks, and friendly atmosphere. We hope you enjoy exploring all that Chiryu has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chu-Bu Centrair International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Chu-Bu Centrair International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access it.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Komaki AFB Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Komaki AFB Airport is used for the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
